history.proof: intros. unfold tryrecv_act_step, tryrecv_act_safe in *. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros. unfold tryrecv_act_step, tryrecv_act_safe in *. intros [pf [H1 [H2 H3]]]. unfold InMem, Mem, Coh in *. split. - auto. - intros. exfalso. apply H3 with (l:=l) (m:=m) (tms:=tms) (from:=from) (rt:=rt). + auto. + auto. + auto. + auto. + auto. + apply filter_correct with (l:=l) (n:=from) (t:=t_rcv rt) (m:=tms). * auto. * reflexivity.
